flawed_nl_solution:
There are currently 9*22=<<9*22=198>>198 episodes out
The new season will have 22+4=<<22+4=30>>30 episodes
So the total number of episodes is 198+30=<<198+30=228>>228 episodes
So it will take 228*0.5=<<228*0.5=114>>114 hours to watch them all
#### 114

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 26, not 30. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
